Summary.Title: Health and Safety Representatives and Health and Safety Committees

Page.Title: Health and Safety Representatives and Health and Safety Committees

PageElement.TextBox:
On the following pages you will be asked  %System_NumberOfQuestions%  questions about health and safety representatives (HSRs) and the duties that a PCBU owes to the representative. We will also ask questions about health and safety committees.

You will be asked multiple choice questions. Answer each question by clicking the button to the left of the most appropriate response.
 
After you answer the last question, you will be given the chance to review and then submit your answers.
 
Please note that if you exit the quiz before clicking the Submit Answers button then your answers will not be saved.

To move between questions, use the ◄and ► navigation buttons on the bottom right of the page.

PageElement.Question:
Fill in the blank. An HSR is a __________ who is elected from among a designated group of workers.


… worker…
… customer…
… PCBU…
… manager…

Workplace health and safety laws impose certain obligations on PCBUs to HSRs. True or false?


True
False

Which of the following is an HSR's function?


To monitor measures taken by the PCBU that are relevant to health and safety
To investigate complaints from workers in the work group concerning health and safety
To represent workers in the work group in health and safety matters
All of the above

Which of the following is NOT the power of an HSR?


To promote the interests of members of a work group who have suffered injury at work
To inquire into anything that appears to be a health and safety risk posed to workers in the work group
To represent workers in health and safety matters without being asked to do so by them
To make health and safety recommendations

Fill in the blank. HSRs may issue a(n) __________ to any person they reasonably believe is contravening health and safety laws.


… undertaking…
… fine…
… provisional improvement notice…
None of the above

What is an HSR personally liable for? 


Any type of function they perform at the workplace, regardless of whether it is health and safety-related
Any omission in the performance of their job
Any exercise of health and safety powers unless those powers have been exercised in good faith
All of the above

Complete the sentence. A PCBU…


… has no obligations to an HSR
… owes several obligations to an HSR
… only owes an obligation to not dismiss an HSR for performing his or her work
… has no additional obligations to an HSR besides the ones it owes all of its workers

If an HSR requests to attend health and safety training what must the PCBU do?


Grant the HSR at least two days' leave to complete the training, and pay the HSR's training fees and regular income
Grant the HSR at least two days' leave to complete the training, but the HSR must pay for the training
Consider whether to permit the HSR to attend
Refuse the request, as an HSR is not allowed to be absent from the workplace for a prolonged period of time

Which obligation does a PCBU owe to an HSR?


To consult with the HSR about health and safety matters, so far as reasonably practicable and confer with a HSR whenever reasonably requested by the HSR
To grant the HSR access to information relating to any possible risks to workers in their work group
To provide the HSR with resources that are reasonably necessary for the HSR to perform their functions
All of the above

Fill in the blank. A Health and Safety Committee facilitates cooperation between __________ in workplace health and safety matters.


… the PCBU and customers…
… the government and workers…
… the PCBU and workers…
… customers and workers…

If a valid request is made for a Health and Safety Committee, when must the PCBU establish the committee?


Within 14 days
Within two months
At a date specified by the workers
As soon as reasonably practicable

What must a PCBU allow members of the Health and Safety Committee to do?


Spend as much time as necessary, and within reason, to meet and perform their functions
Decide whether or not to wear the company uniform
Raise their level of pay
Have one day off each week to have a Committee meeting

Which of the following is NOT a function of a Health and Safety Committee?


To make recommendations relating to health and safety
To facilitate cooperation between the PCBU and workers in instigating, developing and carrying out measures designed to ensure health and safety at work
To enter and search workplaces suspected of health and safety breaches
To assist in developing health and safety standards, rules, policies and procedures

How is a health and safety committee formed?


The PCBU selects all the members of the committee
The most senior workers automatically form the committee
The PCBU and workers (or their representatives) must agree on the members
The committee members must be selected at random

PageElement.TextBox:
You have reached the end of the quiz.

You can now review or change your answers. Use the navigation buttons to move between questions.

When you are happy with your answers, click the Submit Answers button below. You will then see whether you passed the quiz.
